com.iha.emulator.models

Class Adapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iha.emulator.models.Adapter

  • public class Adapter
extends java.lang.Object
    Model of adapter holding information needed to emulate adapter's behaviour.
    Author:
    Filip Sutovsky

    • Property Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

    • Constructor Detail

      • Adapter

        public Adapter(boolean status,
               int id,
               boolean registered,
               Protocol.Version protocolVersion,
               double firmware)
        Creates Adapter model with name "EA"+ given adapter id (Example: EA1111), id, registered indicator, protocol version, firmware version.
        Parameters:
        status - adapter status (true=Active/false=Inactive)
        id - adapter's id
        registered - adapter's registered indicator (is adapter registered on server?)
        protocolVersion - Protocol.Version enum's constant indicating used protocol version
        firmware - adapter's firmware version

      • Adapter

        public Adapter(java.lang.String name,
               boolean status,
               int id,
               boolean registered,
               Protocol.Version protocolVersion,
               double firmware)
        Creates Adapter model with given name, id, registered indicator, protocol version, firmware version.
        Parameters:
        name - adapter's name in emulator context
        status - adapter's status (true=Active/false=Inactive)
        id - adapter's id
        registered - adapter's registered indicator (is adapter registered on server?)
        protocolVersion - Protocol.Version enum's constant indicating used protocol version
        firmware - adapter's firmware version
